New Records: Quinton de Kock hit the joint-fastest half-century in the tournament with 21 runs off 22 balls
Key Match Events: South Africa's bowlers dismissed England in the last three overs to secure a seven-run win
Shai Hope hit eight sixes and scored 82 runs to lead the West Indies to victory over the US
Pre-Game Insights: De Kock dominated South Africa's powerplay with 63 runs in the first 22 balls
South Africa's win streak extended to six games
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Aiden Markram praised the team's skill and fight
England suffered its first loss in the Super Eight after a previous win against the West Indies
Miscellaneous Highlights: The West Indies defeated the US by nine wickets after a loss to England
South Africa is a firm favorite for the semifinals
Others: The match was held at the Darren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in Gros Islet, Saint Lucia
